title: shap.datasets.adult giving error
body:
On jupyter-lab

>import shap
>data,labels = shap.datasets.adult(display=True) 

gives the error:

>---------------------------------------------------------------------------
>AttributeError                            Traceback (most recent call last)
><ipython-input-2-712d8a6d3af3> in <module>
>----> 1 data,labels = shap.datasets.adult(display=True)
>      2 #labels = np.array([int(label) for label in labels])
>
>~/anaconda3/lib/python3.7/site-packages/shap/datasets.py in adult(display)
>    129         if dtype == "category":
>    130             if k == "Relationship":
>--> 131                 data[k] = np.array([rcode[v.strip()] for v in data[k]])
>   132             else:
>    133                 data[k] = data[k].cat.codes
>
>~/anaconda3/lib/python3.7/site-packages/shap/datasets.py in <listcomp>(.0)
>    129         if dtype == "category":
>    130             if k == "Relationship":
>--> 131                 data[k] = np.array([rcode[v.strip()] for v in data[k]])
>    132             else:
>    133                 data[k] = data[k].cat.codes
>
>AttributeError: 'float' object has no attribute 'strip'
>


I copied the code for the adult function from the source, and it worked just fine. Can't seem to find the issue, am I missing something here? Thanks!
